definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be or grow dumb, silent, still (NH id.; Eth. in II. 0admama: stupefy; III., 1 & 2 tadama: tadamama: be astounded, stupefied)—
be silent Ps 4:5, Ps 30:13, Ps 35:15 (prob., cf. De Che), Ez Eze 24:17, Le 10:3 (P) Am 5:13; in grief La 2:10, La 3:28.

be still (opp. to both speech and motion) Job 31:34; = perish Je 8:14, Je 48:2, Ps 31:18 ([[לשׁאול]] ´[[ד]]); c. [[לְ]] be silent to i.e. be resigned to Ps 37:7, Ps 62:6, sq. [[לְמוֹ עֲחָתִי]] Job 29:21 (‖[[לִי שָֽׁמְעוּ]]); be still, motionless, stand still Jos 10:12, Jos 10:13 (of sun ‖[[עמד]]); 1Sa 14:9 (men); Je 47:6 (of sword ‖[[הֵרָֽגְעִי]]); so also of bowels, as seat of mental excitement Job 30:27; La 2:18 [[אַל־תִּדּׂם בַּת־עֵינֵח]], i.e. cease not to weep (‖[[הוֹרִידִי כַנַּחַל דִּמְעָה]]).
be struck dumb, astounded, in amazement and fear Ex 15:16 ([[כאבן]]) Is 23:2 (but cf. II. [[דמם]]).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[וְנׇדַמּוּ]] consec. Je 25:37; Impf. [[יִדַּמּוּ]] Je 49:26, Je 50:30, [[יִדָָּמּוּ]] 1Sa 2:9; 2 mpl. [[תִּדַּמּוּ]] Je 51:6—be made silent, i.e. destroyed; the wicked 1Sa 2:9 ([[בַּחשֶׁח]]), cf. Je 51:6; men of war Je 49:25, Je 50:30; dwellings Je 25:37.

definitions.title: Po.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 s. [[שִׁוִּיתִי וְדוֹמַ֫מְתִּי נַפְשִׁי]] Ps 131:2 ‘composed and quieted my soul’ Che (as a weaned child).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. sf. [[הֲדִמָּנוּ]] he (God) hath silenced us ( = caused to perish) Je 8:14.
